The parents of an individual with an autosomal recessive condition each carry one copy of the mutated gene, but they typically do not show signs and symptoms of the condition.",GHR,Schimke immuno-osseous dysplasia
What are the treatments for Schimke immuno-osseous dysplasia ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of Schimke immuno-osseous dysplasia:  - Gene Review: Gene Revi
